text: Heinrich Gottlob "Heiner" Rau (2 April 1899 â€“ 23 March 1961) was a German communist politician during the time of the Weimar Republic. He was a leading member of the International Brigades, a member of the Landtag of Prussia (1928-1933) and after World War II an East German statesman. He was the chairman of the German Economic Commission, the precursor to the East German government. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1899 births Category:1961 deaths Category:German military personnel of World War I Category:Government ministers of East Germany Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Heads of state of East Germany Category:Members of the Reichstag (Weimar Republic) Category:Members of the Volkskammer Category:Politicians from Stuttgart Category:Politicians of the Socialist Unity Party of Germany Category:Refugees from Nazism
title: Heinrich Rau
